title: Strengthening Science Educators' Hypothesis-Building Strategies and Reflective Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding foundational theories in science and basic principles of instructional design
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, strengthening practical competencies through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to apply three or more uncertainty management strategies in the instructional design process for scientific problem-solving.
Learners will be able to correct 80% or more of the errors that occurred during the design decision-making process using reflection-in-action.
Learners will be able to develop at least one instructional design prototype using smartphone-based tools even in resource-limited technical environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
